about_the_game:
The music that can be heard in the Totonoi Simulator is now available on the soundtrack!

The Totonoi Simulator Soundtrack is a soundtrack of chill and spa music that you can listen to in the Totonoi Simulator.

The soundtrack is a collection of chill and spicy music that you can listen to in the simulator.

It is a soundtrack that allows you to listen to chill and spa music that you can listen to in the Totonoi simulator.

You can listen to a variety of music with Synthesizer V Mocha Totonoi as the main player at any time!

The main BGM, “Tokete, Oyu”,

The ED theme “Futari Totonoi ” is also included.

Enjoy the world of Totonoi Simulator together with the main story!
